itemDescription: Commander in Chief RAF Air Command, Pilot

wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir Christopher Hugh Moran,  (28 April 1956 – 26 May 2010) was a fast jet pilot and later a senior commander in the Royal Air Force. He was Commander-in-Chief of Air Command at the time of his unexpected death.

response: *  2010   – Chris Moran, English air marshal and pilot (b. 1956)
* Chris Moran (1956–2010), Royal Air Force officer

response: *Sir Chris Moran – Commander-in-Chief of RAF Air Command
